title: Darren Chambers Resume
text:
Ambitious Computer Science student with a strong foundation in data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Eager to leverage technical expertise, experience in the military, and a creative mindset to address challenging problems in artificial intelligence and beyond.

darrenc.chambers@gmail.com | My linkedin page



Technical: Python, Pandas, Plotly.express, NumPy, XGBoost, Scikit-learn Soft Skills: Team Leadership, Strategic Thinking, Effective Communication Languages: French (Proficient), Spanish (Basic), Japanese (Basic)


Brigham Young University – Idaho Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (Spring 2025)



Developed a data visualization project focusing on human trafficking, using Python and Plotly.express to create interactive charts and maps, which was recognized for its innovative approach to data presentation at Hack USU 2024 Led the development of an application/website for Amber Alerts, integrating real-time mapping and alerts, targeting a local community program to help child recovery.




2024 Brigham Young University-Idaho – Python Teaching Assistant ( 6 months ) Designed and conducted additional tutorial sessions for students struggling with Python programming, leading to an improvement in grades.
2019-2023 US Army Airborne Infantry (4 years)

In a high-stakes environment ensured the safety and efficiency of equipment worth over $200,000. Mentored new personnel, fostering their professional development and ensuring accurate management of their administrative tasks.




Full-time Missionary in Montreal, Canada The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (2 years) Engaged in community service projects and cultural events, building lasting relationships and increasing community participation in church activities by a significant amount.



Ethical Hacking (Expected 2024)
